name: Infinity Void: Oblitrix (0.14)
description:
THIS ONLY SUPPORTS WINDOWS!

This is a simple text-based RPG I have been creating for a few months. Not my #1 project at the moment, but a good about 3,000 lines of pure batch. The more buys, the more I will work on this large project. I may update monthly, until I get enough sales.

GAME SPECS:

Over 37 different enemies.

Around 45 weapons, and armors.

12 different achievements to earn.

Easy cheating, by editing the save file.

A few secret codes hidden.

Why should I buy?:

Because this game will become more fun as I update. Tons of new content. You can email me ideas on my outlook, if you want. (awesomecore202@outlook.com)
